channel.title: Csci2000s on Andrei Stoica - Code Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Csci2000s on Andrei Stoica - Code Corner

item.description: Tutorial 01 Getting start with Jupyter Cloud and Linux Jupyter Cloud When you first log in you will be asked to log in with your Google account. Please log in with your @ontariotechu.net account. Then click the course code (csci2000) to go to your dashboard. Finaly click on ‘Start My Server’ and confirm by clicking ‘Launch Server’ -> This may take a few moments. Especially if a lot of students are trying to access Jupyter Cloud at the same time.
